ygData.subject: Popup help messages in Heritrix 2.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, In Heritrix 1.12 you could read popup help messages in the Configure Settings pages when you clicked the question mark beside a property. In Heritrix 2.0

In Heritrix 1.12 you could read popup help messages in the Configure
S=
ettings pages when you clicked the question mark beside a property.

itrix 2.0 when I click the "details" link for items that had
help for then =

iption." for root:scope:rules:2
